name: Present Shopping At The All Night Garage
name_original: Present Shopping At The All Night Garage
description:
Inspired by the song of the same name by Joe Cornish.

This was made over the course of a month, it's hacked together and coming apart at the seams. But crucially, it's a mostly finished project that was a whistle stop tour of every single aspect of game development, from rigging and animating, to baking lightmaps, to fiddling about with the UI every 20 seconds, to not sleeping for 36 hours straight to get it finished in time. I will probably maybe improve it later (maybe not).

WASD to move, Mouse to look, left click to interact with things wot you are close to
